For me, this is one of if not the best first person shooters when it comes to the smoothness of the game mechanics. Everything has been polished to perfection over the very long time that Counter Strike has been around. Nice and varied list of maps and modes that get updated and swapped around every once in a while. There are always opponents available on the servers and it's just a game that never gets old for me. Definitely a classic.

This game is classic... It needs no reviews or marks because it's classic... You can not place this in any tops because it's not fair. Despite the cheaters, the shitty teammates, the "outdated graphics" (for some of the gamers it's a reason to hate it so...) this game is a LEGEND and it will be a legend forever, no matter the criticism.

One of the best FPS of all time. Frustrating yet rewarding, the simple but hard to master gameplay is more restrictive than other games like it. However the simplicity gives it charm. Teamwork is key to success in the game. Finding your niche on a 5 man team is a challenge on it's own. The customization adds another layer to the game. Skins are what made the game popular and as controversial as they are, it is a great addition to the game. Overall for PC FPS fans this is the king of competitive shooters.
